title: mask
name: Premium Washable Mask
description: Training Mask will make your workout so efficient, you can actually cut the amount of time spent in training by as much as two-thirds. Simply strap it on and begin your normal work out. Within days, you'll see the difference!

title: mask
name: SmartMask Pro
description: The Phantom Training Mask is a training device that helps you to train breathing muscles which you need for any sport. The breathing process is essential for any physical activity, yet we pay little attention to it.

title: mask
name: Stealth Mask
description: This changes with the Phantom Training Mask. It sets your focus on your breathing by limiting your air supply during training.

title: mask
name: Premium Camo
description: Broadside dual sealing design is from imitating human facemade of liquid silicone without skin irritation.

description: Durable with camera mount, easy attached to go pro cameras Double air-flow channel, inhaling and exhaling separate
